text: The King Maker Leader is a 2003 Indian Malayalam film, directed by Diphan, starring Saikumar (Malayalam actor) and Aishwarya in the lead role. http://www.filmibeat.com/malayalam/movies/the-king-maker-leader.html ==Cast== *Vijayakumar as Thulasidharan * Rajan P Dev as DGP Kaimal * Maniyanpilla Raju as Sadashivan * Aishwarya as Vasanthy Nambiar * Chali Pala * Jagannadha Varma as Padoor Vishnu Namboothiri * Jayaram as Leader * Jose Pallissery as Potti * Mahima as Reporter * Poornima Anand as Annie Joseph * Rajeev Kalamassery as Thampichan * Sadiq * Saikumar as Varghese * Usharani as Bharathiyamma * Vijayaraghavan as Ramachandra Prasad * Subhash Menon as Commissioner Surendran IPS * Niveditha as Vasanthy's assistant *Paravoor Ramachandran *Subair as Ananthutty *Majeed as Tourism Minister Mathew *Aliyar as Sakhavu ==References== ==External links== * Category:2003 films Category:Indian films Category:2000s Malayalam-language films
title: The King Maker Leader
